question: Which union ministry has launched an online complaint system "sexual harassment e-box" at workplace?
option1: Ministry of  Women and Child Development
answer: Ministry of  Women and Child Development
explanation: Maneka Gandhi, the Union Minister for Women and Child Development, has launched an online complaint system \" Sexual Harassment e-box (SHe-Box)\" for registering sexual harassment complaints at workplace in New Delhi on July 24, 2017.  Initially, this online portal is open for central government women employees only and later on, complaints from private sector will be entertained effectively. The complaint management system has been developed to ensure the effective implementation of Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013 (SH Act). This portal will provide a platform to women working or visiting any office of Central Government to file complaints related to sexual harassment at workplace under the SH Act. Beside this, the Ministry will soon conduct a national level survey to examine the magnitude of sexual harassment at workplace.
